qas.question: What President did Kanye West insult on air in 2005?
Whose speech did Kanye West ruin at the 2009 MTV Awards?
What fashion items does Kanye West design?
What company did Kanye West begin?
What year did Kanye West begin working with Adidas?

context: West's outspoken views and ventures outside of music have received significant mainstream attention. He has been a frequent source of controversy and public scrutiny for his conduct at award shows, on social media, and in other public settings. His more publicized comments include his declaration that President <a0_0>George W. Bush<a0_0/> "doesn't care about black people" during a live 2005 television broadcast for Hurricane Katrina relief, and his interruption of singer <a1_0>Taylor Swift<a1_0/> at the 2009 MTV Video Music Awards. West's efforts as a designer include collaborations with Nike, Louis Vuitton, and A.P.C. on both <a2_0>clothing and footwear<a2_0/>, and have most prominently resulted in the Yeezy Season collaboration with Adidas beginning in <a4_0>2013<a4_0/>. He is the founder and head of the creative content company <a3_0>DONDA<a3_0/>.
